name: Hot Mom
description:
Hot Mom is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This game will immerse you headlong into the story of a guy who goes to college and needs a new apartment. He moves in with his mom's girlfriend, who turns out to be very, very sexy.

In this wonderful game you have to plunge into the story of a guy who moved in with his mom's girlfriend because he had to go to university in another city. He did not even suspect that this girlfriend would be such a hot and sexy woman. The couple quickly develops a romance. What happened next you will see in the game. Get real pleasure from a very simple gameplay and cool music.

Beautiful graphics!
Relaxing music!
Exciting sex scenes!
